title: Thinstall Virtualization Suite Package Editor (The Joker)
description:
Folder "Package EditorTools" is tools for Package Editor use. You can put any useful tools here like "ThinConvert", "RegistryConvert", "Thinstall.vs", and so on. Support to pick shortcut that place in this folder. Just put this folder to where Package Editor installed.

>> Version 2008.03.01.2210 ( Public Build ) 
- Update All to 3.348.
- Added New GUI controler.
- Fixed Build Problem.
- Fixed RegConvert Problem [ .Reg To .TXT ].
- Fixed GUI control bugs.

>> Version 2008.02.20.2310 ( Public Build )

- Fixed Help File View&#039;s Problem.
- Fixed GUI control bugs.
- Fixed Problem When Use Long Path.
